dialogue.text: MUST... B-B-B-BE... CUUUUTE! GOTTA BE CUTE! Flawless! PERFECT! ALWAYS!
Uhhh... You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means.
She sounds like she's in pain. That 'cute' sounds... forced. Like a mask.
MASK?! THIS IS ME! THE REAL ME! JUST SH-SHUT UP! SING! SING DAMMIT! MAKE THE NOISE STOP!
Alright, alright! Don't glitch your circuits! Sheesh.
Just play along for now, babe.
